Text: This movie is not widescreen.  Everything is squished and skinnier than it should be to fit into the 3:4 aspect ratio.  That sucks, but the movie is one of my favs.
seed please. Thank you. Saw it on television the other day and absolutely loved it. Wanted to add it to my collection.
Not able to open it with a normal player. Unrecognizable. Pity, its a great film though.
